name: Jos Verstappen
introduction: Johannes Franciscus "Jos" Verstappen (born March 4, 1972 at Montfort, Netherlands) is a former Dutch Formula One driver who competed from in between 1994 and 2003. Verstappen competed for the Benetton, Simtek, Footwork, Tyrrell, Stewart, Arrows and Minardi teams. He is the father of current F1 driver Max Verstappen.
